items.prompt: Listen to the bank comparison and answer: Which bank has the highest APY?
items.transcript: Customer: I am looking for a better savings account. Agent: Well, Legacy Bank offers 0.5% APY, but our Neobank Plus account offers 3.5% APY. It is much more profitable for your savings.
items.explanation: The agent states that Neobank Plus offers 3.5%, which is higher than 0.5%.

items.prompt: Listen and answer: Why is the customer complaining?
items.transcript: Customer: My old bank was slower and the app was very difficult to use. This new app is much more intuitive and faster.
options: The old app was difficult and slow
items.explanation: The customer mentions the old bank was slower and difficult to use.

items.prompt: Listen and answer: Which feature is 'seamless'?
items.transcript: Agent: Our onboarding process is completely seamless. You just take a photo of your ID, and the account is ready in minutes.
items.explanation: The agent explicitly says the onboarding process is seamless.

items.prompt: Listen and answer: How does the agent describe the maintenance fees?

items.prompt: Listen and answer: What is the main advantage of the Premium Plan?

items.prompt: Read the text and answer: What is one main advantage of neobanks mentioned in the text?
items.text: The Rise of Challenger Banks. In the last decade, neobanks have become more popular than traditional banks for young professionals. One reason is that they offer lower fees and a better User Experience (UX). Unlike legacy banks, which have many physical branches and high maintenance costs, neobanks operate entirely online. This makes them more scalable and efficient. However, some people still prefer traditional banks because they feel safer with a physical building they can visit.
items.explanation: The text mentions lower fees as a reason for their popularity.
